import React from "react"; import { Button, FormControl, InputLabel, Select, MenuItem, FormHelperText, Container, } from "@material-ui/core"; import {Field} from "formik"; const Step1 = (props) => { if (props.currentStep !== 1) return null; return ( Duration: 3 Months 6 Months 12 Months Amount of gigabytes in a cloud: 3 GB 5 GB 10 GB 20 GB 30 GB 50 GB Upfront payment: No Yes
); }; export default Step1;
